p: All treatments were arranged in a completely randomized design. The data of percent inhibition of mycelial growth were transformed with the arcsine: √ percent inhibition/100 [ 25]. Analysis of variance ( p ≤ 0.05) and Tukey’s test ( p ≤ 0.05) were performed using the SAS statistical package (V. 9.0., SAS Inst. Inc., Cary, NC, USA).
